comment.body:
Nice points, definitely things we need to tackle to actually get some traction going here.

With regards to site administration/moderation, while we already have the ability to set up a permissions structure in the JSON, I believe a UI in the site sidebar (perhaps open-able with a button as not to clutter things) that would allow you to set permissions for addresses different addresses across your site would be incredibly useful.

As far as chat protocols, outside of ZeroNet [Matrix](https://riot.im/app/#/room/!RmNFmSmPGVOlDalBwR:amorgan.xyz?via=amorgan.xyz&via=matrix.org) has been getting some good chatter and is decentralized/FOSS. While a good short-term solution, we should probably look to something based on ZeroNet (and perhaps using the PeerMessage plugin) sometime in the future.
